body:
#### PR description:

Add a new scenario (2026D47) and its corresponding workflow 22434 with latest version of Phase2 geometry together with HFNose

#### PR validation:

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No back porting is needed
title: Phase2-hcx214 Add a new scenario and workflow with latest Phase2 configuration including HFNose
